item.description:
High Tide at Kittery Point - 12:14 PM

Open to all Sea and recreational kayaks longer than 10ft Join us for an afternoon paddle launching at the Kittery Town Dock at Pepperell Cove then paddling up Chauncey Creek with the incoming tide then cross the estuary into Brave Boat harbor. We will stop and take a break at Brave Boat Harbor, then return to Pepperell Cove. Those with sea kayaks and the necessary skills may want to circumnavigate Gerrish Island. Others will head back the same route with the outgoing tide. Bring a snack to eat and water/beverages to consume during the trip.

Note: Due to limited parking availability this event is limited to 25 people. If you plan to launch from Odiorne, Fort Stark or Fort Foster let us know in your RSVP and we'll add more spots for others to attend. Launching at the Kittery Town Dock takes more time then usual because of where we have to park... Please be early!

Life vests aka PFDs must be worn at all times while paddling with this group.

Directions:
* Take Interstate 95 North from Portsmouth, NH
* Take exit 2 to merge onto ME-236/Rte-236 toward US-1
* At the traffic circle, take the 3rd exit onto ME-236/Rogers Rd
* Slight left at ME-103/Whipple Rd Continue to follow ME-103 Continue to follow ME-103 2miles Belamy Rd is on right at Pepperil Cove / Captain & Patty's Restaurant www.capandpatty.com

Note: There is limited parking at town dock but after unloading you can park across from Captain & Patty's "prior name Captain Simeons" "there is a parking fee at Captain Simeons lot" or at the elementary school down the road where parking is free. NOTE: There is now a $5 Launch Fee being collected for using the Peperill Cove Boat Ramp however there is free parking in the elementary school parking lot about 1/4 mile away.

Google Maps directions to launch site at Kittery Town Dock at Pepperill Cove below

http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geocode=&q=Bellamy+Ln.,+Kittery+Point+,+ME+03905,+us&sll=43.083167,-70.702654&sspn=0.002696,0.003294&ie=UTF8&t=h&z=16&iwloc=A
item.name: Chauncey Creek to Brave Boat Harbor, Kittery Point Maine
